name: Totally Accurate Driving Sim
description:
A not so accurate depiction of driving...

This game is a prototype so it will have many bugs that will be fixed if there is a continuation of the project.

We have noticed that the name is very close to the game "Totally Accurate Battle Simulator" and to not wanting to copy, the name may be changed in the next update.

(All assets used will be in final credits of project)

Next Update:

- Easier installation as well as no problems opening it

- "You lose" scene

- Changed camera movement

- Not seeing cursor when moving camera

- Fixed car noise

Future Updates:

- Finished Map

- Less glitches

- Possible story mode

- Changed name?

Rules:

- Hitting humans will take away points.

- Though hit soldiers and buildings until you get 2k points in under 2 minutes.
